doc.after: Political activist Thierry Meyssan and filmmaker Dylan Avery claim that American Airlines Flight 77 did not crash into the Pentagon. Instead, they argue that the Pentagon was hit by a missile launched by elements from inside the U.S. government. Reopen911.org says that the holes in the Pentagon walls were far too small to have been made by a Boeing 757: "How does a plane 125Â ft. wide and 155Â ft. long fit into a hole which is only 60Â ft. across?" Meyssanâs book, LâEffroyable Imposture (published in English as 9/11: The Big Lie) became available in more than a dozen languages. When released, the book was heavily criticized by both the mainstream French and American press, and later, from within the 9/11 Truth movement by researchers such as Hoffman[101] and websites such as oilempire.us.[102] The French newspaper Liberation called the book "a tissue of wild and irresponsible allegations, entirely without foundation."[103][104][105]
